title: React Fundamentals
shortDescription: Learn core React concepts like components, props, and state.
description: This course provides a strong foundation in React. You'll build multiple projects while learning about JSX, props, state management, and component lifecycles.

title: Advanced React Patterns
shortDescription: Master React hooks, context, and performance optimization.
description: Go beyond the basics by learning advanced patterns for reusability and performance. Covers Context API, custom hooks, memoization, and more.

title: Data Analysis with Python
shortDescription: Analyze data efficiently using Pandas and NumPy.
description: Hands-on introduction to data analysis. Learn to clean, visualize, and interpret real datasets using Python libraries such as NumPy and Pandas.

title: Intro to Machine Learning
shortDescription: Learn supervised and unsupervised learning basics.
description: Understand the concepts behind machine learning algorithms and apply them using scikit-learn. Includes regression, classification, and clustering.

title: React Native for Beginners
shortDescription: Build cross-platform apps with React Native.
description: Create your first mobile app using React Native. Learn about components, navigation, and integration with APIs.

title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
shortDescription: Learn the principles of user interface and experience design.
description: Explore color theory, typography, and layout principles. Learn how to design wireframes and prototypes for web and mobile apps.

title: Node.js Backend Development
shortDescription: Build RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.
description: Learn backend development using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Build scalable APIs and connect them to frontend clients.

title: Python for Data Science
shortDescription: Use Python to explore, analyze, and visualize data.
description: Comprehensive introduction to Python programming for data science. Learn essential libraries and practical workflows for real-world datasets.

title: Modern HTML & CSS
shortDescription: Master modern web layout using Flexbox and Grid.
description: Learn how to structure and style websites using semantic HTML and advanced CSS techniques including Flexbox and CSS Grid.

title: Deep Learning Essentials
shortDescription: Implement neural networks with TensorFlow and PyTorch.
description: This course introduces deep learning fundamentals. Build models using TensorFlow and PyTorch and understand CNNs, RNNs, and transfer learning.
